findings.title: Flashloan Attack
findings.description: When working with exchange rates, they should be received from a trusted source and not be vulnerable to short-term rate changes that can be achieved by using flash loans. Oracles should be used.

findings.title: Token Supply manipulation
findings.description: Tokens can be minted only according to rules specified in a whitepaper or any other documentation provided by the customer.

findings.title: Style guide violation
findings.description: Style guides and best practices should be followed.

findings.title: Requirements Compliance
findings.description: The code should be compliant with requirements provided by the Customer,

findings.title: Repository Consistency
findings.description: The repository should contain a configured development environment with a comprehensive description of how to compile, build and deploy the code.

findings.title: Redundant use of gas during contract deployment
findings.description: This may lead to a redundant use of gas during the contract deployment.

findings.title: Missing zero address validation
findings.description: Address parameters are being used without checking against the possibility of 0x0, which can lead to unwanted external calls to 0x0.

findings.title: Default Visibility
findings.description: Functions and state variables visibility should be set explicitly. Visibility levels should be specified consciously.

findings.title: Integer Overflow and Underflow
findings.description: If unchecked math is used, all math operations should be safe from overflows and underflows.

findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: It is recommended to use a recent version of the Solidity compiler.

findings.title: Unchecked Call Return Value
findings.description: The contract does not check the return value of an external call.

findings.title: Access Control & Authorization
findings.description: Delegatecalls should only be allowed to trusted addresses.

findings.title: SELFDESTRUCT Instruction
findings.description: The contract should not be destroyed until it has funds belonging to users.

findings.title: Uninitialized Storage Pointer
findings.description: Storage type should be set explicitly if the compiler version is < 0.5.0.

findings.title: Deprecated Solidity Functions
findings.description: Deprecated built-in functions should never be used.
